bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQS_TSEL_ENABLE_0
bit_ranges.description: Operation type tsel enables for DQS signals for slice 0. Bit (0) enables tsel_en during read cycles. Bit (1) enables tsel_en during write cycles. Bit (2) enables tsel_en during idle cycles. Set each bit to 1 to enable.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQ_TSEL_SELECT_0
bit_ranges.description: Operation type tsel select values for DQ/DM signals for slice 0. Bits (3:0) are tsel_sel values during read cycles. Bits (7:4) are tsel_sel values during write cycles. Bits (11:8) are tsel_sel values during idle cycles.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_TWO_CYC_PREAMBLE_0
bit_ranges.description: cycle preamble support for slice 0. Bit (0) controls the 2 cycle read preamble. Bit (1) controls the 2 cycle write preamble. Set each bit to 1 to enable.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQS_TSEL_SELECT_0
bit_ranges.description: Operation type tsel select values for DQS signals for slice 0. Bits (3:0) are tsel_sel values during read cycles. Bits (7:4) are tsel_sel values during write cycles. Bits (11:8) are tsel_sel values during idle cycles.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_PER_CS_TRAINING_INDEX_0
bit_ranges.description: For per-rank training, indicates which ranksparamtersareread/ writtenforslice0.'

bit_ranges.name: PHY_PER_CS_TRAINING_MULTICAST_EN_0
bit_ranges.description: When set, a register write will update parameters for all ranks at the same time in slice 0. Set to 1 to enable.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_PER_RANK_CS_MAP_0
bit_ranges.description: Per-rank CS map for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DBI_MODE_0

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_BOOT_RPTR_UPDATE_0

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_BOOT_RDDATA_EN_TSEL_DLY_0
bit_ranges.description: For LPDDR4 boot frequency, the number of cycles that the dfi_rddata_en signal is earlier than necessary for TSEL enable generation for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_BOOT_RDDATA_EN_DLY_0
bit_ranges.description: For LPDDR4 boot frequency, the number of cycles that the dfi_rddata_en signal is early for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_BOOT_RDDATA_EN_IE_DLY_0
bit_ranges.description: For LPDDR4 boot frequency, the number of cycles that the dfi_rddata_en signal is earlier than necessary for input enable generation for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SLICE_PWR_RDC_DISABLE_0
bit_ranges.description: data slice power reduction disable for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LPBK_CONTROL_0
bit_ranges.description: Loopback control bits for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_BOOT_RDDQS_LATENCY_ADJUST_0
bit_ranges.description: For LPDDR4 boot frequency, the number of cycles to delay the incoming dfi_rddata_en for read DQS gate generation for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: SC_PHY_SNAP_OBS_REGS_0
bit_ranges.description: Initiates a snapshot of the internal observation registers for slice 0. Set to 1 to trigger.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GATE_ERROR_DELAY_SELECT_0
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to wait for the DQS gate to close before flagging an error for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQS_DQ_BYPASS_SLAVE_DELAY_0
bit_ranges.description: Read DQS data clock bypass mode slave delay setting for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GATE_SMPL1_SLAVE_DELAY_0
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to delay the read DQS gate signal to generate gate1 signal for on the fly read DQS training for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LPDDR_TYPE_0
bit_ranges.description: Indicates the type of DRAM for slice 0. Clear to 0 for DDR3 or DDR4, program to 1 for LPDDR3, or program to 2 for LPDDR4.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LPDDR_0
bit_ranges.description: Indicates a cycle of delay for the slice 0 to match the address slice.

bit_ranges.name: ON_FLY_GATE_ADJUST_EN_0
bit_ranges.description: Control the on the fly gate adjustment for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GATE_SMPL2_SLAVE_DELAY_0
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to delay the read DQS gate signal to generate gate2 signal for on the fly read DQS training for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GATE_TRACKING_OBS_0
bit_ranges.description: Report the on the fly gate measurement result for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_PST_AMBLE_0
bit_ranges.description: Controls the read postamble extension for LPDDR4 for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DFI40_POLARITY_0
bit_ranges.description: Indicates the dfi_wrdata_cs_n and dfi_rddata_cs_n is low active or high active.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_RDLVL_PATT8_0
bit_ranges.description: LPDDR4 read leveling pattern 8 data for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_RDLVL_PATT9_0
bit_ranges.description: LPDDR4 read leveling pattern 9 data for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_RDLVL_PATT10_0
bit_ranges.description: LPDDR4 read leveling pattern 10 data for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_RDLVL_PATT11_0
bit_ranges.description: LPDDR4 read leveling pattern 11 data for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQ_ENC_OBS_SELECT_0
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map the internal read DQ slave delay encoded settings to the accessible read DQ encoded slave delay observation register for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_MASTER_DLY_LOCK_OBS_SELECT_0
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map the internal master delay observation registers to the accessible master delay observation register for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_FIFO_PTR_RST_DISABLE_0
bit_ranges.description: Disables automatic reset of the read entry FIFO pointers for slice 0. Set to 1 to disable automatic resets.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SLAVE_LOOP_CNT_UPDATE_0
bit_ranges.description: Sets the frequency by which the slave delay encoded value holding registers are updated for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_FIFO_PTR_OBS_SELECT_0
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map the internal read entry FIFO read/write pointers to the accessible read entry FIFO pointer observation register for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WR_SHIFT_OBS_SELECT_0
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map the internal write DQ/DQS automatic cycle/ half_cycle shift settings to the accessible write DQ/DQS shift observation register for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WR_ENC_OBS_SELECT_0
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map the internal write DQ slave delay encoded settings to the accessible write DQ encoded slave delay observation register for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQS_DQ_ENC_OBS_SELECT_0
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map the internal read DQS DQ rise/fall slave delay encoded settings to the accessible read DQS DQ rise/fall encoded slave delay observation registers for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_UPDT_WAIT_CNT_0
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to wait after changing DQS slave delay setting during write leveling for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_CAPTURE_CNT_0
bit_ranges.description: Number of samples to take at each DQS slave delay setting during write leveling for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: SC_PHY_LVL_DEBUG_CONT_0
bit_ranges.description: Allows the leveling state machine to advance (when in debug mode) for slice 0. Set to 1 to trigger.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LVL_DEBUG_MODE_0
bit_ranges.description: Enables leveling debug mode for slice 0. Set to 1 to enable.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_UPDT_WAIT_CNT_0
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to wait after changing DQS slave delay setting during read leveling for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_CAPTURE_CNT_0
bit_ranges.description: Number of samples to take at each DQS slave delay setting during read leveling for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_UPDT_WAIT_CNT_0
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles + 4 to wait after changing DQS slave delay setting during gate training for slice 0. The valid range is 0x0 to 0xB.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_CAPTURE_CNT_0
bit_ranges.description: Number of samples to take at each DQS slave delay setting during gate training for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_BURST_CNT_0
bit_ranges.description: Defines the write/read burst length in bytes during the write data leveling sequence for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_DATA_MASK_0
bit_ranges.description: Per-bit mask for read leveling for slice 0. If all bits are not used, only 1 bit should be cleared to 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_RDDQS_DQ_OBS_SELECT_0
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map an individual DQ data window leading/trailing edge to the leading/trailing edge observation registers during read leveling for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_OP_MODE_0
bit_ranges.description: Read leveling algorithm select for slice 0. Clear to 0 to move linearly from left to right. Set to 1 to start inside the window, move left and then move right.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_UPDT_WAIT_CNT_0
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to wait after changing the DQ slave delay setting during write data leveling for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_DQDM_SLV_DLY_JUMP_OFFSET_0
bit_ranges.description: Defines the write/read burst length in bytes during the write data leveling sequence for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_PATT_0
bit_ranges.description: Defines the training patterns to be used during the write data leveling sequence for slice 0. Bit (0) corresponds to the LFSR data training pattern. Bit (1) corresponds to the CLK data training pattern. Bit (2) corresponds to user-defined data pattern training. If multiple bits are set, the training for each of the chosen patterns will be executed and the settings that give the smallest data valid window eye will be chosen.

bit_ranges.name: SC_PHY_WDQLVL_CLR_PREV_RESULTS_0
bit_ranges.description: Clears the previous result value to allow a clean slate comparison for future write DQ leveling results for slice 0. Set to 1 to trigger.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_QTR_DLY_STEP_0
bit_ranges.description: Defines the step granularity for the logic to use once an edge is found. When this occurs, the logic jumps back to the previous invalid value and uses this step size to determine a more accurate delay value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_DQDM_OBS_SELECT_0
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map an individual DQ data window leading/trailing edge to the leading/trailing edge observation registers during write data leveling for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_DATADM_MASK_0
bit_ranges.description: Per-bit mask for write data leveling for slice 0. Set to 1 to mask any bit from the leveling process.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_USER_PATT0_0
bit_ranges.description: User-defined pattern to be used during write data leveling for slice 0. This register holds the bytes 3 to 0 written/read from device.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_USER_PATT1_0
bit_ranges.description: User-defined pattern to be used during write data leveling for slice 0. This register holds the bytes 7 to 4 written/read from device.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_USER_PATT2_0
bit_ranges.description: User-defined pattern to be used during write data leveling for slice 0. This register holds the bytes 11 to 8 written/read from device.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_USER_PATT3_0
bit_ranges.description: User-defined pattern to be used during write data leveling for slice 0. This register holds the bytes 15 to 12 written/read from device.

bit_ranges.name: SC_PHY_MANUAL_CLEAR_0
bit_ranges.description: Manual reset/clear of internal logic for slice 0. Bit (0) initiates manual setup of the read DQS gate. Bit (1) is reset of read entry FIFO pointers. Bit (2) is reset of master delay min/ max lock values. Bit (3) is manual reset of master delay unlock counter. Bit (4) is reset of leveling error bit in the leveling status registers. Bit (5) is clearing of the gate tracking observation register. Set each bit to 1 to initiate/reset.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_CALVL_VREF_DRIVING_SLICE_0
bit_ranges.description: Indicates if slice 0 is used to drive the VREF value to the device during CA training.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_USER_PATT4_0
bit_ranges.description: User-defined pattern to be used during write data leveling for slice 0. This register holds the DM bit for the 15 to 0 DQ written/read from device.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_FIFO_PTR_OBS_0
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for read entry FIFO pointers for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LPBK_RESULT_OBS_0

bit_ranges.description: Falling edge read DQS slave delay setting for DQ7 for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQS_GATE_SLAVE_DELAY_0
bit_ranges.description: Read DQS slave delay setting for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQS_DM_FALL_SLAVE_DELAY_0
bit_ranges.description: Falling edge read DQS slave delay setting for DM for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_DELAY_EARLY_THRESHOLD_0
bit_ranges.description: Write level delay threshold above which will be considered in previous cycle for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRITE_PATH_LAT_ADD_0
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to delay the incoming dfi_wrdata_en/dfi_wrdata signals for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQS_LATENCY_ADJUST_0
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to delay the incoming dfi_rddata_en for read DQS gate generation for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_EARLY_FORCE_ZERO_0
bit_ranges.description: Force the final write level delay value (that meets the early threshold) to 0 for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_DELAY_PERIOD_THRESHOLD_0
bit_ranges.description: Write level delay threshold below which will add a cycle of write path latency for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_LAT_ADJ_START_0
bit_ranges.description: Initial read DQS gate cycle delay from dfi_rddata_en during gate training for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_RDDQS_SLV_DLY_START_0
bit_ranges.description: Initial read DQS gate slave delay setting during gate training for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_RDDQS_DQ_SLV_DLY_START_0
bit_ranges.description: Read leveling starting value for the DQS/DQ slave delay settings for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_DQDM_SLV_DLY_START_0
bit_ranges.description: Initial DQ/DM slave delay setting during write data leveling for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: RESERVED
bit_ranges.description: Reserved for future use. Refer to the regconfig files for the default programming.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQS_OE_TIMING_0
bit_ranges.description: Start/end timing values for DQS output enable signals for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQ_TSEL_WR_TIMING_0
bit_ranges.description: Start/end timing values for DQ/DM write based termination enable and select signals for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQ_TSEL_RD_TIMING_0
bit_ranges.description: Start/end timing values for DQ/DM read based termination enable and select signals for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQ_OE_TIMING_0
bit_ranges.description: Start/end timing values for DQ/DM output enable signals for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQ_IE_TIMING_0
bit_ranges.description: Start/end timing values for DQ/DM input enable signals for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_PER_CS_TRAINING_EN_0
bit_ranges.description: Enables the per-rank training and read/write timing capabilities. Must have same value in all slices.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQS_TSEL_WR_TIMING_0
bit_ranges.description: Start/end timing values for DQS write based termination enable and select signals for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQS_TSEL_RD_TIMING_0
bit_ranges.description: Start/end timing values for DQS read based termination enable and select signals for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDATA_EN_DLY_0
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles that the dfi_rddata_en signal is early for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_IE_MODE_0
bit_ranges.description: Input enable mode bits for slice 0. Bit (0) enables the mode where the input enables are always on; set to 1 to enable. Bit (1) disables the input enable on the DM signal; set to 1 to disable.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDATA_EN_IE_DLY_0
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles that the dfi_rddata_en signal is earlier than necessary for input enable generation for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQS_IE_TIMING_0
bit_ranges.description: Start/end timing values for DQS input enable signals for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_MASTER_DELAY_START_0
bit_ranges.description: Start value for master delay line locking algorithm for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_MASTER_MODE_0
bit_ranges.description: Master delay line override settings for slice 0. Bit (0) enables software half clock mode. Bit (1) is the software half clock mode value. Bit (2) enables software bypass mode. Bit (3) is the software bypass mode value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDATA_EN_TSEL_DLY_0
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles that the dfi_rddata_en signal is earlier than necessary for TSEL enable generation for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_DLY_STEP_0
bit_ranges.description: DQS slave delay step size during write leveling for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RPTR_UPDATE_0
bit_ranges.description: Offset in cycles from the dfi_rddata_en signal to release data from the entry FIFO for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_MASTER_DELAY_WAIT_0
bit_ranges.description: Wait cycles for master delay line locking algorithm for slice 0. Bits (3:0) are the cycle wait count after a calibration clock setting change. Bits (7:4) are the cycle wait count after a master delay setting change.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_MASTER_DELAY_STEP_0
bit_ranges.description: Incremental step size for master delay line locking algorithm for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_RESP_WAIT_CNT_0
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles + 4 to wait between dfi_rddata_en and the sampling of the DQS during gate training for slice 0. The valid range is 0x0 to 0xB.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_DLY_STEP_0
bit_ranges.description: DQS slave delay step size during gate training for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_RESP_WAIT_CNT_0
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to wait between dfi_wrlvl_strobe and the sampling of the DQs during write leveling for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_FINAL_STEP_0
bit_ranges.description: Final backup step delay used in gate training algorithm for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_BACK_STEP_0
bit_ranges.description: Interim backup step delay used in gate training algorithm for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_DLY_STEP_0
bit_ranges.description: DQS slave delay step size during read leveling for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_DLY_STEP_0
bit_ranges.description: DQ slave delay step size during write data leveling for slice 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQ_DM_SWIZZLE0_1
bit_ranges.description: DQ/DM bit swizzling 0 for slice 1. Bits (3:0) inform the PHY which bit in {DM,DQ]} map to DQ0, Bits (7:4) inform the PHY which bit in {DM,DQ} map to DQ1, etc.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_CLK_WR_BYPASS_SLAVE_DELAY_1
bit_ranges.description: Write data clock bypass mode slave delay setting for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQ_DM_SWIZZLE1_1
bit_ranges.description: DQ/DM bit swizzling 1 for slice 1. Bits (3:0) inform the PHY which bit in {DM,DQ]} map to DM.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_CLK_BYPASS_OVERRIDE_1
bit_ranges.description: Bypass mode override setting for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_BYPASS_TWO_CYC_PREAMBLE_1
bit_ranges.description: PHY two_cycle_preamble for bypass mode for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQS_GATE_BYPASS_SLAVE_DELAY_1
bit_ranges.description: Read DQS bypass mode slave delay setting for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_WRDQ3_SHIFT_1
bit_ranges.description: Manual override of automatic half_cycle_shift/cycle_shift for write DQ3 for slice 1. Bit (0) enables override of half_cycle_shift. Bit (1) is the half_cycle_shift value. Bit (2) enables override of cycle shift. Bits (4:3) are the cycle_shift value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_WRDQ2_SHIFT_1
bit_ranges.description: Manual override of automatic half_cycle_shift/cycle_shift for write DQ2 for slice 1. Bit (0) enables override of half_cycle_shift. Bit (1) is the half_cycle_shift value. Bit (2) enables override of cycle shift. Bits (4:3) are the cycle_shift value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_WRDQ1_SHIFT_1
bit_ranges.description: Manual override of automatic half_cycle_shift/cycle_shift for write DQ1 for slice 1. Bit (0) enables override of half_cycle_shift. Bit (1) is the half_cycle_shift value. Bit (2) enables override of cycle shift. Bits (4:3) are the cycle_shift value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_WRDQ0_SHIFT_1
bit_ranges.description: Manual override of automatic half_cycle_shift/cycle_shift for write DQ0 for slice 1. Bit (0) enables override of half_cycle_shift. Bit (1) is the half_cycle_shift value. Bit (2) enables override of cycle shift. Bits (4:3) are the cycle_shift value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_WRDQ7_SHIFT_1
bit_ranges.description: Manual override of automatic half_cycle_shift/cycle_shift for write DQ7 for slice 1. Bit (0) enables override of half_cycle_shift. Bit (1) is the half_cycle_shift value. Bit (2) enables override of cycle shift. Bits (4:3) are the cycle_shift value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_WRDQ6_SHIFT_1
bit_ranges.description: Manual override of automatic half_cycle_shift/cycle_shift for write DQ6 for slice 1. Bit (0) enables override of half_cycle_shift. Bit (1) is the half_cycle_shift value. Bit (2) enables override of cycle shift. Bits (4:3) are the cycle_shift value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_WRDQ5_SHIFT_1
bit_ranges.description: Manual override of automatic half_cycle_shift/cycle_shift for write DQ5 for slice 1. Bit (0) enables override of half_cycle_shift. Bit (1) is the half_cycle_shift value. Bit (2) enables override of cycle shift. Bits (4:3) are the cycle_shift value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_WRDQ4_SHIFT_1
bit_ranges.description: Manual override of automatic half_cycle_shift/cycle_shift for write DQ4 for slice 1. Bit (0) enables override of half_cycle_shift. Bit (1) is the half_cycle_shift value. Bit (2) enables override of cycle shift. Bits (4:3) are the cycle_shift value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQ_TSEL_ENABLE_1
bit_ranges.description: Operation type tsel enables for DQ/ DM signals for slice 1. Bit (0) enables tsel_en during read cycles. Bit (1) enables tsel_en during write cycles. Bit (2) enables tsel_en during idle cycles. Set each bit to 1 to enable.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_WRDQS_SHIFT_1
bit_ranges.description: Manual override of automatic half_cycle_shift/cycle_shift for write DQS for slice 1. Bit (0) enables override of half_cycle_shift. Bit (1) is the half_cycle_shift value. Bit (2) enables override of cycle shift. Bit (3) is the cycle_shift value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_WRDM_SHIFT_1
bit_ranges.description: Manual override of automatic half_cycle_shift/cycle_shift for write DM for slice 1. Bit (0) enables override of half_cycle_shift. Bit (1) is the half_cycle_shift value. Bit (2) enables override of cycle shift. Bits (4:3) are the cycle_shift value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQS_TSEL_ENABLE_1
bit_ranges.description: Operation type tsel enables for DQS signals for slice 1. Bit (0) enables tsel_en during read cycles. Bit (1) enables tsel_en during write cycles. Bit (2) enables tsel_en during idle cycles. Set each bit to 1 to enable.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQ_TSEL_SELECT_1
bit_ranges.description: Operation type tsel select values for DQ/DM signals for slice 1. Bits (3:0) are tsel_sel values during read cycles. Bits (7:4) are tsel_sel values during write cycles. Bits (11:8) are tsel_sel values during idle cycles.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_TWO_CYC_PREAMBLE_1
bit_ranges.description: cycle preamble support for slice 1. Bit (0) controls the 2 cycle read preamble. Bit (1) controls the 2 cycle write preamble. Set each bit to 1 to enable.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQS_TSEL_SELECT_1
bit_ranges.description: Operation type tsel select values for DQS signals for slice 1. Bits (3:0) are tsel_sel values during read cycles. Bits (7:4) are tsel_sel values during write cycles. Bits (11:8) are tsel_sel values during idle cycles.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_PER_CS_TRAINING_INDEX_1
bit_ranges.description: For per-rank training, indicates which ranksparamtersareread/ writtenforslice1.'

bit_ranges.name: PHY_PER_CS_TRAINING_MULTICAST_EN_1
bit_ranges.description: When set, a register write will update parameters for all ranks at the same time in slice 1. Set to 1 to enable.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_PER_RANK_CS_MAP_1
bit_ranges.description: Per-rank CS map for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DBI_MODE_1
bit_ranges.description: DBI mode for slice 1. Bit (0) enables return of DBI read data. Bit (1) enables read leveling of the DBI signal only.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_BOOT_RPTR_UPDATE_1
bit_ranges.description: For LPDDR4 boot frequency, the offset in cycles from the dfi_rddata_en signal to release data from the entry FIFO for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_BOOT_RDDATA_EN_TSEL_DLY_1
bit_ranges.description: For LPDDR4 boot frequency, the number of cycles that the dfi_rddata_en signal is earlier than necessary for TSEL enable generation for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_BOOT_RDDATA_EN_DLY_1
bit_ranges.description: For LPDDR4 boot frequency, the number of cycles that the dfi_rddata_en signal is early for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_BOOT_RDDATA_EN_IE_DLY_1
bit_ranges.description: For LPDDR4 boot frequency, the number of cycles that the dfi_rddata_en signal is earlier than necessary for input enable generation for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SLICE_PWR_RDC_DISABLE_1
bit_ranges.description: data slice power reduction disable for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LPBK_CONTROL_1
bit_ranges.description: Loopback control bits for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_BOOT_RDDQS_LATENCY_ADJUST_1
bit_ranges.description: For LPDDR4 boot frequency, the number of cycles to delay the incoming dfi_rddata_en for read DQS gate generation for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: SC_PHY_SNAP_OBS_REGS_1
bit_ranges.description: Initiates a snapshot of the internal observation registers for slice 1. Set to 1 to trigger.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GATE_ERROR_DELAY_SELECT_1
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to wait for the DQS gate to close before flagging an error for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQS_DQ_BYPASS_SLAVE_DELAY_1
bit_ranges.description: Read DQS data clock bypass mode slave delay setting for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GATE_SMPL1_SLAVE_DELAY_1
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to delay the read DQS gate signal to generate gate1 signal for on the fly read DQS training for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LPDDR_TYPE_1
bit_ranges.description: Indicates the type of DRAM for slice 1. Clear to 0 for DDR3 or DDR4, program to 1 for LPDDR3, or program to 2 for LPDDR4.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LPDDR_1
bit_ranges.description: Indicates a cycle of delay for the slice 1 to match the address slice.

bit_ranges.name: ON_FLY_GATE_ADJUST_EN_1
bit_ranges.description: Control the on the fly gate adjustment for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GATE_SMPL2_SLAVE_DELAY_1
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to delay the read DQS gate signal to generate gate2 signal for on the fly read DQS training for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GATE_TRACKING_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Report the on the fly gate measurement result for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_PST_AMBLE_1
bit_ranges.description: Controls the read postamble extension for LPDDR4 for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DFI40_POLARITY_1
bit_ranges.description: Indicates the dfi_wrdata_cs_n and dfi_rddata_cs_n is low active or high active.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_RDLVL_PATT8_1
bit_ranges.description: LPDDR4 read leveling pattern 8 data for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_RDLVL_PATT9_1
bit_ranges.description: LPDDR4 read leveling pattern 9 data for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_RDLVL_PATT10_1
bit_ranges.description: LPDDR4 read leveling pattern 10 data for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_RDLVL_PATT11_1
bit_ranges.description: LPDDR4 read leveling pattern 11 data for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQ_ENC_OBS_SELECT_1
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map the internal read DQ slave delay encoded settings to the accessible read DQ encoded slave delay observation register for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_MASTER_DLY_LOCK_OBS_SELECT_1
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map the internal master delay observation registers to the accessible master delay observation register for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_FIFO_PTR_RST_DISABLE_1
bit_ranges.description: Disables automatic reset of the read entry FIFO pointers for slice 1. Set to 1 to disable automatic resets.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SLAVE_LOOP_CNT_UPDATE_1
bit_ranges.description: Sets the frequency by which the slave delay encoded value holding registers are updated for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_FIFO_PTR_OBS_SELECT_1
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map the internal read entry FIFO read/write pointers to the accessible read entry FIFO pointer observation register for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WR_SHIFT_OBS_SELECT_1
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map the internal write DQ/DQS automatic cycle/ half_cycle shift settings to the accessible write DQ/DQS shift observation register for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WR_ENC_OBS_SELECT_1
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map the internal write DQ slave delay encoded settings to the accessible write DQ encoded slave delay observation register for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQS_DQ_ENC_OBS_SELECT_1
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map the internal read DQS DQ rise/fall slave delay encoded settings to the accessible read DQS DQ rise/fall encoded slave delay observation registers for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_UPDT_WAIT_CNT_1
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to wait after changing DQS slave delay setting during write leveling for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_CAPTURE_CNT_1
bit_ranges.description: Number of samples to take at each DQS slave delay setting during write leveling for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: SC_PHY_LVL_DEBUG_CONT_1
bit_ranges.description: Allows the leveling state machine to advance (when in debug mode) for slice 1. Set to 1 to trigger.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LVL_DEBUG_MODE_1
bit_ranges.description: Enables leveling debug mode for slice 1. Set to 1 to enable.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_UPDT_WAIT_CNT_1
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to wait after changing DQS slave delay setting during read leveling for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_CAPTURE_CNT_1
bit_ranges.description: Number of samples to take at each DQS slave delay setting during read leveling for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_UPDT_WAIT_CNT_1
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles + 4 to wait after changing DQS slave delay setting during gate training for slice 1. The valid range is 0x0 to 0xB.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_CAPTURE_CNT_1
bit_ranges.description: Number of samples to take at each DQS slave delay setting during gate training for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_BURST_CNT_1
bit_ranges.description: Defines the write/read burst length in bytes during the write data leveling sequence for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_DATA_MASK_1
bit_ranges.description: Per-bit mask for read leveling for slice 1. If all bits are not used, only 1 bit should be cleared to 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_RDDQS_DQ_OBS_SELECT_1
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map an individual DQ data window leading/trailing edge to the leading/trailing edge observation registers during read leveling for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_OP_MODE_1
bit_ranges.description: Read leveling algorithm select for slice 1. Clear to 0 to move linearly from left to right. Set to 1 to start inside the window, move left and then move right.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_UPDT_WAIT_CNT_1
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to wait after changing the DQ slave delay setting during write data leveling for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_DQDM_SLV_DLY_JUMP_OFFSET_1
bit_ranges.description: Defines the write/read burst length in bytes during the write data leveling sequence for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_PATT_1
bit_ranges.description: Defines the training patterns to be used during the write data leveling sequence for slice 1. Bit (0) corresponds to the LFSR data training pattern. Bit (1) corresponds to the CLK data training pattern. Bit (2) corresponds to user-defined data pattern training. If multiple bits are set, the training for each of the chosen patterns will be executed and the settings that give the smallest data valid window eye will be chosen.

bit_ranges.name: SC_PHY_WDQLVL_CLR_PREV_RESULTS_1
bit_ranges.description: Clears the previous result value to allow a clean slate comparison for future write DQ leveling results for slice 1. Set to 1 to trigger.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_QTR_DLY_STEP_1
bit_ranges.description: Defines the step granularity for the logic to use once an edge is found. When this occurs, the logic jumps back to the previous invalid value and uses this step size to determine a more accurate delay value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_DQDM_OBS_SELECT_1
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map an individual DQ data window leading/trailing edge to the leading/trailing edge observation registers during write data leveling for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_DATADM_MASK_1
bit_ranges.description: Per-bit mask for write data leveling for slice 1. Set to 1 to mask any bit from the leveling process.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_USER_PATT0_1
bit_ranges.description: User-defined pattern to be used during write data leveling for slice 1. This register holds the bytes 3 to 0 written/read from device.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_USER_PATT1_1
bit_ranges.description: User-defined pattern to be used during write data leveling for slice 1. This register holds the bytes 7 to 4 written/read from device.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_USER_PATT2_1
bit_ranges.description: User-defined pattern to be used during write data leveling for slice 1. This register holds the bytes 11 to 8 written/read from device.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_USER_PATT3_1
bit_ranges.description: User-defined pattern to be used during write data leveling for slice 1. This register holds the bytes 15 to 12 written/read from device.

bit_ranges.name: SC_PHY_MANUAL_CLEAR_1
bit_ranges.description: Manual reset/clear of internal logic for slice 1. Bit (0) initiates manual setup of the read DQS gate. Bit (1) is reset of read entry FIFO pointers. Bit (2) is reset of master delay min/ max lock values. Bit (3) is manual reset of master delay unlock counter. Bit (4) is reset of leveling error bit in the leveling status registers. Bit (5) is clearing of the gate tracking observation register. Set each bit to 1 to initiate/reset.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_CALVL_VREF_DRIVING_SLICE_1
bit_ranges.description: Indicates if slice 1 is used to drive the VREF value to the device during CA training.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_USER_PATT4_1
bit_ranges.description: User-defined pattern to be used during write data leveling for slice 1. This register holds the DM bit for the 15 to 0 DQ written/read from device.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_FIFO_PTR_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for read entry FIFO pointers for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LPBK_RESULT_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register containing loopback status/results for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_MASTER_DLY_LOCK_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for master delay results for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LPBK_ERROR_COUNT_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register containing total number of loopback error data for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQS_DQ_FALL_ADDER_SLV_DLY_ENC_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for read DQS DQ falling edge adder slave delay encoded value for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQS_DQ_RISE_ADDER_SLV_DLY_ENC_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for read DQS DQ rising edge adder slave delay encoded value for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQS_BASE_SLV_DLY_ENC_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for read DQS base slave delay encoded value for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQ_SLV_DLY_ENC_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for read DQ slave delay encoded values for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRDQ_BASE_SLV_DLY_ENC_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for write DQ base slave delay encoded value for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRDQS_BASE_SLV_DLY_ENC_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for write DQS base slave delay encoded value for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQS_GATE_SLV_DLY_ENC_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for read DQS gate slave delay encoded value for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_HARD0_DELAY_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for write leveling last hard 0 DQS slave delay for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WR_SHIFT_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for automatic half cycle and cycle shift values for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WR_ADDER_SLV_DLY_ENC_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for write adder slave delay encoded value for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_HARD1_DELAY_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for write leveling first hard 1 DQS slave delay for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_STATUS_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for write leveling status for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GATE_SMPL2_SLV_DLY_ENC_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for gate sample1 slave delay encoded values for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GATE_SMPL1_SLV_DLY_ENC_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for gate sample1 slave delay encoded values for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_HARD0_DELAY_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for gate training first hard 0 DQS slave delay for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_ERROR_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for write leveling error status for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_STATUS_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for gate training status for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_HARD1_DELAY_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for gate training last hard 1 DQS slave delay for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_RDDQS_DQ_TE_DLY_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for read leveling data window trailing edge slave delay setting for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_RDDQS_DQ_LE_DLY_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for read leveling data window leading edge slave delay setting for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_RDDQS_DQ_NUM_WINDOWS_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for read leveling number of windows found for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_STATUS_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for read leveling status for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_DQDM_TE_DLY_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for write data leveling data window trailing edge slave delay setting for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_DQDM_LE_DLY_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for write data leveling data window leading edge slave delay setting for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_STATUS_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for write data leveling status for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DDL_MODE_1
bit_ranges.description: DDL mode for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DDL_TEST_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: DDL test observation for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DDL_TEST_MSTR_DLY_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: DDL test observation delays for slice 1 master DDL.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RX_CAL_DQ0_1
bit_ranges.description: RX Calibration codes for DQ0 for slice 1. Bits (5:0) contain rx_cal_code_down. Bits (11:6) contain rx_cal_code_up. Bits (17:12) contain rx_cal_code2_down. Bits (23:18) contain rx_cal_code2_up.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RX_CAL_DQ3_1
bit_ranges.description: RX Calibration codes for DQ3 for slice 1. Bits (5:0) contain rx_cal_code_down. Bits (11:6) contain rx_cal_code_up. Bits (17:12) contain rx_cal_code2_down. Bits (23:18) contain rx_cal_code2_up.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RX_CAL_DQ2_1
bit_ranges.description: RX Calibration codes for DQ2 for slice 1. Bits (5:0) contain rx_cal_code_down. Bits (11:6) contain rx_cal_code_up. Bits (17:12) contain rx_cal_code2_down. Bits (23:18) contain rx_cal_code2_up.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RX_CAL_DQ5_1
bit_ranges.description: RX Calibration codes for DQ5 for slice 1. Bits (5:0) contain rx_cal_code_down. Bits (11:6) contain rx_cal_code_up. Bits (17:12) contain rx_cal_code2_down. Bits (23:18) contain rx_cal_code2_up.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RX_CAL_DQ4_1
bit_ranges.description: RX Calibration codes for DQ4 for slice 1. Bits (5:0) contain rx_cal_code_down. Bits (11:6) contain rx_cal_code_up. Bits (17:12) contain rx_cal_code2_down. Bits (23:18) contain rx_cal_code2_up.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RX_CAL_DQ7_1
bit_ranges.description: RX Calibration codes for DQ7 for slice 1. Bits (5:0) contain rx_cal_code_down. Bits (11:6) contain rx_cal_code_up. Bits (17:12) contain rx_cal_code2_down. Bits (23:18) contain rx_cal_code2_up.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RX_CAL_DQ6_1
bit_ranges.description: RX Calibration codes for DQ6 for slice 1. Bits (5:0) contain rx_cal_code_down. Bits (11:6) contain rx_cal_code_up. Bits (17:12) contain rx_cal_code2_down. Bits (23:18) contain rx_cal_code2_up.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RX_CAL_DQS_1
bit_ranges.description: RX Calibration codes for DQS for slice 1. Bits (5:0) contain rx_cal_code_down. Bits (11:6) contain rx_cal_code_up. Bits (17:12) contain rx_cal_code2_down. Bits (23:18) contain rx_cal_code2_up.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RX_CAL_DM_1
bit_ranges.description: RX Calibration codes for DM for slice 1. Bits (5:0) contain rx_cal_code_down. Bits (11:6) contain rx_cal_code_up. Bits (17:12) contain rx_cal_code2_down. Bits (23:18) contain rx_cal_code2_up.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RX_CAL_OBS_1
bit_ranges.description: RX Calibration results for slice 1. Bits (7:0) contain calibration results from DQ0-7. Bit (8) contains calibration result from DM. Bit (9) contains calibration result from DQS. Bit (10) contains calibration result from FDBK.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RX_CAL_FDBK_1
bit_ranges.description: RX Calibration codes for FDBK for slice 1. Bits (5:0) contain rx_cal_code_down. Bits (11:6) contain rx_cal_code_up. Bits (17:12) contain rx_cal_code2_down. Bits (23:18) contain rx_cal_code2_up.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_DELAY_EARLY_THRESHOLD_1
bit_ranges.description: Write level delay threshold above which will be considered in previous cycle for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRITE_PATH_LAT_ADD_1
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to delay the incoming dfi_wrdata_en/dfi_wrdata signals for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQS_LATENCY_ADJUST_1
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to delay the incoming dfi_rddata_en for read DQS gate generation for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_EARLY_FORCE_ZERO_1
bit_ranges.description: Force the final write level delay value (that meets the early threshold) to 0 for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_DELAY_PERIOD_THRESHOLD_1
bit_ranges.description: Write level delay threshold below which will add a cycle of write path latency for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_LAT_ADJ_START_1
bit_ranges.description: Initial read DQS gate cycle delay from dfi_rddata_en during gate training for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_RDDQS_SLV_DLY_START_1
bit_ranges.description: Initial read DQS gate slave delay setting during gate training for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_RDDQS_DQ_SLV_DLY_START_1
bit_ranges.description: Read leveling starting value for the DQS/DQ slave delay settings for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_DQDM_SLV_DLY_START_1
bit_ranges.description: Initial DQ/DM slave delay setting during write data leveling for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: RESERVED
bit_ranges.description: Reserved for future use. Refer to the regconfig files for the default programming.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQS_OE_TIMING_1
bit_ranges.description: Start/end timing values for DQS output enable signals for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQ_TSEL_WR_TIMING_1
bit_ranges.description: Start/end timing values for DQ/DM write based termination enable and select signals for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQ_TSEL_RD_TIMING_1
bit_ranges.description: Start/end timing values for DQ/DM read based termination enable and select signals for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQ_OE_TIMING_1
bit_ranges.description: Start/end timing values for DQ/DM output enable signals for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQ_IE_TIMING_1
bit_ranges.description: Start/end timing values for DQ/DM input enable signals for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_PER_CS_TRAINING_EN_1
bit_ranges.description: Enables the per-rank training and read/write timing capabilities. Must have same value in all slices.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQS_TSEL_WR_TIMING_1
bit_ranges.description: Start/end timing values for DQS write based termination enable and select signals for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQS_TSEL_RD_TIMING_1
bit_ranges.description: Start/end timing values for DQS read based termination enable and select signals for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDATA_EN_DLY_1
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles that the dfi_rddata_en signal is early for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_IE_MODE_1
bit_ranges.description: Input enable mode bits for slice 1. Bit (0) enables the mode where the input enables are always on; set to 1 to enable. Bit (1) disables the input enable on the DM signal; set to 1 to disable.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDATA_EN_IE_DLY_1
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles that the dfi_rddata_en signal is earlier than necessary for input enable generation for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQS_IE_TIMING_1
bit_ranges.description: Start/end timing values for DQS input enable signals for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_MASTER_DELAY_START_1
bit_ranges.description: Start value for master delay line locking algorithm for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_MASTER_MODE_1
bit_ranges.description: Master delay line override settings for slice 1. Bit (0) enables software half clock mode. Bit (1) is the software half clock mode value. Bit (2) enables software bypass mode. Bit (3) is the software bypass mode value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDATA_EN_TSEL_DLY_1
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles that the dfi_rddata_en signal is earlier than necessary for TSEL enable generation for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_DLY_STEP_1
bit_ranges.description: DQS slave delay step size during write leveling for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RPTR_UPDATE_1
bit_ranges.description: Offset in cycles from the dfi_rddata_en signal to release data from the entry FIFO for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_MASTER_DELAY_WAIT_1
bit_ranges.description: Wait cycles for master delay line locking algorithm for slice 1. Bits (3:0) are the cycle wait count after a calibration clock setting change. Bits (7:4) are the cycle wait count after a master delay setting change.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_MASTER_DELAY_STEP_1
bit_ranges.description: Incremental step size for master delay line locking algorithm for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_RESP_WAIT_CNT_1
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles + 4 to wait between dfi_rddata_en and the sampling of the DQS during gate training for slice 1. The valid range is 0x0 to 0xB.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_DLY_STEP_1
bit_ranges.description: DQS slave delay step size during gate training for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_RESP_WAIT_CNT_1
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to wait between dfi_wrlvl_strobe and the sampling of the DQs during write leveling for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_FINAL_STEP_1
bit_ranges.description: Final backup step delay used in gate training algorithm for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_BACK_STEP_1
bit_ranges.description: Interim backup step delay used in gate training algorithm for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_DLY_STEP_1
bit_ranges.description: DQS slave delay step size during read leveling for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_DLY_STEP_1
bit_ranges.description: DQ slave delay step size during write data leveling for slice 1.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQ_DM_SWIZZLE0_2
bit_ranges.description: DQ/DM bit swizzling 0 for slice 2. Bits (3:0) inform the PHY which bit in {DM,DQ]} map to DQ0, Bits (7:4) inform the PHY which bit in {DM,DQ} map to DQ1, etc.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_CLK_WR_BYPASS_SLAVE_DELAY_2
bit_ranges.description: Write data clock bypass mode slave delay setting for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQ_DM_SWIZZLE1_2
bit_ranges.description: DQ/DM bit swizzling 1 for slice 2. Bits (3:0) inform the PHY which bit in {DM,DQ]} map to DM.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_CLK_BYPASS_OVERRIDE_2
bit_ranges.description: Bypass mode override setting for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_BYPASS_TWO_CYC_PREAMBLE_2
bit_ranges.description: PHY two_cycle_preamble for bypass mode for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQS_GATE_BYPASS_SLAVE_DELAY_2
bit_ranges.description: Read DQS bypass mode slave delay setting for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_WRDQ3_SHIFT_2
bit_ranges.description: Manual override of automatic half_cycle_shift/cycle_shift for write DQ3 for slice 2. Bit (0) enables override of half_cycle_shift. Bit (1) is the half_cycle_shift value. Bit (2) enables override of cycle shift. Bits (4:3) are the cycle_shift value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_WRDQ2_SHIFT_2
bit_ranges.description: Manual override of automatic half_cycle_shift/cycle_shift for write DQ2 for slice 2. Bit (0) enables override of half_cycle_shift. Bit (1) is the half_cycle_shift value. Bit (2) enables override of cycle shift. Bits (4:3) are the cycle_shift value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_WRDQ1_SHIFT_2
bit_ranges.description: Manual override of automatic half_cycle_shift/cycle_shift for write DQ1 for slice 2. Bit (0) enables override of half_cycle_shift. Bit (1) is the half_cycle_shift value. Bit (2) enables override of cycle shift. Bits (4:3) are the cycle_shift value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_WRDQ0_SHIFT_2
bit_ranges.description: Manual override of automatic half_cycle_shift/cycle_shift for write DQ0 for slice 2. Bit (0) enables override of half_cycle_shift. Bit (1) is the half_cycle_shift value. Bit (2) enables override of cycle shift. Bits (4:3) are the cycle_shift value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_WRDQ7_SHIFT_2
bit_ranges.description: Manual override of automatic half_cycle_shift/cycle_shift for write DQ7 for slice 2. Bit (0) enables override of half_cycle_shift. Bit (1) is the half_cycle_shift value. Bit (2) enables override of cycle shift. Bits (4:3) are the cycle_shift value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_WRDQ6_SHIFT_2
bit_ranges.description: Manual override of automatic half_cycle_shift/cycle_shift for write DQ6 for slice 2. Bit (0) enables override of half_cycle_shift. Bit (1) is the half_cycle_shift value. Bit (2) enables override of cycle shift. Bits (4:3) are the cycle_shift value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_WRDQ5_SHIFT_2
bit_ranges.description: Manual override of automatic half_cycle_shift/cycle_shift for write DQ5 for slice 2. Bit (0) enables override of half_cycle_shift. Bit (1) is the half_cycle_shift value. Bit (2) enables override of cycle shift. Bits (4:3) are the cycle_shift value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_WRDQ4_SHIFT_2
bit_ranges.description: Manual override of automatic half_cycle_shift/cycle_shift for write DQ4 for slice 2. Bit (0) enables override of half_cycle_shift. Bit (1) is the half_cycle_shift value. Bit (2) enables override of cycle shift. Bits (4:3) are the cycle_shift value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQ_TSEL_ENABLE_2
bit_ranges.description: Operation type tsel enables for DQ/ DM signals for slice 2. Bit (0) enables tsel_en during read cycles. Bit (1) enables tsel_en during write cycles. Bit (2) enables tsel_en during idle cycles. Set each bit to 1 to enable.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_WRDQS_SHIFT_2
bit_ranges.description: Manual override of automatic half_cycle_shift/cycle_shift for write DQS for slice 2. Bit (0) enables override of half_cycle_shift. Bit (1) is the half_cycle_shift value. Bit (2) enables override of cycle shift. Bit (3) is the cycle_shift value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_WRDM_SHIFT_2
bit_ranges.description: Manual override of automatic half_cycle_shift/cycle_shift for write DM for slice 2. Bit (0) enables override of half_cycle_shift. Bit (1) is the half_cycle_shift value. Bit (2) enables override of cycle shift. Bits (4:3) are the cycle_shift value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQS_TSEL_ENABLE_2
bit_ranges.description: Operation type tsel enables for DQS signals for slice 2. Bit (0) enables tsel_en during read cycles. Bit (1) enables tsel_en during write cycles. Bit (2) enables tsel_en during idle cycles. Set each bit to 1 to enable.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQ_TSEL_SELECT_2
bit_ranges.description: Operation type tsel select values for DQ/DM signals for slice 2. Bits (3:0) are tsel_sel values during read cycles. Bits (7:4) are tsel_sel values during write cycles. Bits (11:8) are tsel_sel values during idle cycles.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_TWO_CYC_PREAMBLE_2
bit_ranges.description: cycle preamble support for slice 2. Bit (0) controls the 2 cycle read preamble. Bit (1) controls the 2 cycle write preamble. Set each bit to 1 to enable.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DQS_TSEL_SELECT_2
bit_ranges.description: Operation type tsel select values for DQS signals for slice 2. Bits (3:0) are tsel_sel values during read cycles. Bits (7:4) are tsel_sel values during write cycles. Bits (11:8) are tsel_sel values during idle cycles.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_PER_CS_TRAINING_INDEX_2
bit_ranges.description: For per-rank training, indicates which ranksparamtersareread/ writtenforslice2.'

bit_ranges.name: PHY_PER_CS_TRAINING_MULTICAST_EN_2
bit_ranges.description: When set, a register write will update parameters for all ranks at the same time in slice 2. Set to 1 to enable.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_PER_RANK_CS_MAP_2
bit_ranges.description: Per-rank CS map for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DBI_MODE_2
bit_ranges.description: DBI mode for slice 2. Bit (0) enables return of DBI read data. Bit (1) enables read leveling of the DBI signal only.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_BOOT_RPTR_UPDATE_2
bit_ranges.description: For LPDDR4 boot frequency, the offset in cycles from the dfi_rddata_en signal to release data from the entry FIFO for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_BOOT_RDDATA_EN_TSEL_DLY_2
bit_ranges.description: For LPDDR4 boot frequency, the number of cycles that the dfi_rddata_en signal is earlier than necessary for TSEL enable generation for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_BOOT_RDDATA_EN_DLY_2
bit_ranges.description: For LPDDR4 boot frequency, the number of cycles that the dfi_rddata_en signal is early for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_BOOT_RDDATA_EN_IE_DLY_2
bit_ranges.description: For LPDDR4 boot frequency, the number of cycles that the dfi_rddata_en signal is earlier than necessary for input enable generation for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SLICE_PWR_RDC_DISABLE_2
bit_ranges.description: data slice power reduction disable for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LPBK_CONTROL_2
bit_ranges.description: Loopback control bits for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_BOOT_RDDQS_LATENCY_ADJUST_2
bit_ranges.description: For LPDDR4 boot frequency, the number of cycles to delay the incoming dfi_rddata_en for read DQS gate generation for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: SC_PHY_SNAP_OBS_REGS_2
bit_ranges.description: Initiates a snapshot of the internal observation registers for slice 2. Set to 1 to trigger.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GATE_ERROR_DELAY_SELECT_2
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to wait for the DQS gate to close before flagging an error for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQS_DQ_BYPASS_SLAVE_DELAY_2
bit_ranges.description: Read DQS data clock bypass mode slave delay setting for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GATE_SMPL1_SLAVE_DELAY_2
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to delay the read DQS gate signal to generate gate1 signal for on the fly read DQS training for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LPDDR_TYPE_2
bit_ranges.description: Indicates the type of DRAM for slice 2. Clear to 0 for DDR3 or DDR4, program to 1 for LPDDR3, or program to 2 for LPDDR4.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LPDDR_2
bit_ranges.description: Indicates a cycle of delay for the slice 2 to match the address slice.

bit_ranges.name: ON_FLY_GATE_ADJUST_EN_2
bit_ranges.description: Control the on the fly gate adjustment for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GATE_SMPL2_SLAVE_DELAY_2
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to delay the read DQS gate signal to generate gate2 signal for on the fly read DQS training for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GATE_TRACKING_OBS_2
bit_ranges.description: Report the on the fly gate measurement result for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_PST_AMBLE_2
bit_ranges.description: Controls the read postamble extension for LPDDR4 for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_DFI40_POLARITY_2
bit_ranges.description: Indicates the dfi_wrdata_cs_n and dfi_rddata_cs_n is low active or high active.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_RDLVL_PATT8_2
bit_ranges.description: LPDDR4 read leveling pattern 8 data for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_RDLVL_PATT9_2
bit_ranges.description: LPDDR4 read leveling pattern 9 data for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_RDLVL_PATT10_2
bit_ranges.description: LPDDR4 read leveling pattern 10 data for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LP4_RDLVL_PATT11_2
bit_ranges.description: LPDDR4 read leveling pattern 11 data for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQ_ENC_OBS_SELECT_2
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map the internal read DQ slave delay encoded settings to the accessible read DQ encoded slave delay observation register for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_MASTER_DLY_LOCK_OBS_SELECT_2
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map the internal master delay observation registers to the accessible master delay observation register for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SW_FIFO_PTR_RST_DISABLE_2
bit_ranges.description: Disables automatic reset of the read entry FIFO pointers for slice 2. Set to 1 to disable automatic resets.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_SLAVE_LOOP_CNT_UPDATE_2
bit_ranges.description: Sets the frequency by which the slave delay encoded value holding registers are updated for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_FIFO_PTR_OBS_SELECT_2
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map the internal read entry FIFO read/write pointers to the accessible read entry FIFO pointer observation register for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WR_SHIFT_OBS_SELECT_2
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map the internal write DQ/DQS automatic cycle/ half_cycle shift settings to the accessible write DQ/DQS shift observation register for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WR_ENC_OBS_SELECT_2
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map the internal write DQ slave delay encoded settings to the accessible write DQ encoded slave delay observation register for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQS_DQ_ENC_OBS_SELECT_2
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map the internal read DQS DQ rise/fall slave delay encoded settings to the accessible read DQS DQ rise/fall encoded slave delay observation registers for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_UPDT_WAIT_CNT_2
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to wait after changing DQS slave delay setting during write leveling for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_CAPTURE_CNT_2
bit_ranges.description: Number of samples to take at each DQS slave delay setting during write leveling for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: SC_PHY_LVL_DEBUG_CONT_2
bit_ranges.description: Allows the leveling state machine to advance (when in debug mode) for slice 2. Set to 1 to trigger.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LVL_DEBUG_MODE_2
bit_ranges.description: Enables leveling debug mode for slice 2. Set to 1 to enable.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_UPDT_WAIT_CNT_2
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to wait after changing DQS slave delay setting during read leveling for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_CAPTURE_CNT_2
bit_ranges.description: Number of samples to take at each DQS slave delay setting during read leveling for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_UPDT_WAIT_CNT_2
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles + 4 to wait after changing DQS slave delay setting during gate training for slice 2. The valid range is 0x0 to 0xB.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_CAPTURE_CNT_2
bit_ranges.description: Number of samples to take at each DQS slave delay setting during gate training for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_BURST_CNT_2
bit_ranges.description: Defines the write/read burst length in bytes during the write data leveling sequence for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_DATA_MASK_2
bit_ranges.description: Per-bit mask for read leveling for slice 2. If all bits are not used, only 1 bit should be cleared to 0.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_RDDQS_DQ_OBS_SELECT_2
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map an individual DQ data window leading/trailing edge to the leading/trailing edge observation registers during read leveling for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_OP_MODE_2
bit_ranges.description: Read leveling algorithm select for slice 2. Clear to 0 to move linearly from left to right. Set to 1 to start inside the window, move left and then move right.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_UPDT_WAIT_CNT_2
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to wait after changing the DQ slave delay setting during write data leveling for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_DQDM_SLV_DLY_JUMP_OFFSET_2
bit_ranges.description: Defines the write/read burst length in bytes during the write data leveling sequence for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_PATT_2
bit_ranges.description: Defines the training patterns to be used during the write data leveling sequence for slice 2. Bit (0) corresponds to the LFSR data training pattern. Bit (1) corresponds to the CLK data training pattern. Bit (2) corresponds to user-defined data pattern training. If multiple bits are set, the training for each of the chosen patterns will be executed and the settings that give the smallest data valid window eye will be chosen.

bit_ranges.name: SC_PHY_WDQLVL_CLR_PREV_RESULTS_2
bit_ranges.description: Clears the previous result value to allow a clean slate comparison for future write DQ leveling results for slice 2. Set to 1 to trigger.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_QTR_DLY_STEP_2
bit_ranges.description: Defines the step granularity for the logic to use once an edge is found. When this occurs, the logic jumps back to the previous invalid value and uses this step size to determine a more accurate delay value.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_DQDM_OBS_SELECT_2
bit_ranges.description: Select value to map an individual DQ data window leading/trailing edge to the leading/trailing edge observation registers during write data leveling for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_DATADM_MASK_2
bit_ranges.description: Per-bit mask for write data leveling for slice 2. Set to 1 to mask any bit from the leveling process.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_USER_PATT0_2
bit_ranges.description: User-defined pattern to be used during write data leveling for slice 2. This register holds the bytes 3 to 0 written/read from device.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_USER_PATT1_2
bit_ranges.description: User-defined pattern to be used during write data leveling for slice 2. This register holds the bytes 7 to 4 written/read from device.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_USER_PATT2_2
bit_ranges.description: User-defined pattern to be used during write data leveling for slice 2. This register holds the bytes 11 to 8 written/read from device.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_USER_PATT3_2
bit_ranges.description: User-defined pattern to be used during write data leveling for slice 2. This register holds the bytes 15 to 12 written/read from device.

bit_ranges.name: SC_PHY_MANUAL_CLEAR_2
bit_ranges.description: Manual reset/clear of internal logic for slice 2. Bit (0) initiates manual setup of the read DQS gate. Bit (1) is reset of read entry FIFO pointers. Bit (2) is reset of master delay min/ max lock values. Bit (3) is manual reset of master delay unlock counter. Bit (4) is reset of leveling error bit in the leveling status registers. Bit (5) is clearing of the gate tracking observation register. Set each bit to 1 to initiate/reset.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_CALVL_VREF_DRIVING_SLICE_2
bit_ranges.description: Indicates if slice 2 is used to drive the VREF value to the device during CA training.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_USER_PATT4_2
bit_ranges.description: User-defined pattern to be used during write data leveling for slice 2. This register holds the DM bit for the 15 to 0 DQ written/read from device.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_FIFO_PTR_OBS_2
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for read entry FIFO pointers for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LPBK_RESULT_OBS_2
bit_ranges.description: Observation register containing loopback status/results for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_MASTER_DLY_LOCK_OBS_2
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for master delay results for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_LPBK_ERROR_COUNT_OBS_2
bit_ranges.description: Observation register containing total number of loopback error data for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQS_DQ_FALL_ADDER_SLV_DLY_ENC_OBS_2
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for read DQS DQ falling edge adder slave delay encoded value for slice 2.

bit_ranges.description: Observation register for read DQS DQ rising edge adder slave delay encoded value for slice 2.

bit_ranges.description: Observation register for read DQS base slave delay encoded value for slice 2.

bit_ranges.description: Observation register for read DQS gate slave delay encoded value for slice 2.

bit_ranges.description: Observation register for write leveling last hard 0 DQS slave delay for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WR_SHIFT_OBS_2
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for automatic half cycle and cycle shift values for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WR_ADDER_SLV_DLY_ENC_OBS_2
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for write adder slave delay encoded value for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_HARD1_DELAY_OBS_2
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for write leveling first hard 1 DQS slave delay for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_STATUS_OBS_2
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for write leveling status for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GATE_SMPL2_SLV_DLY_ENC_OBS_2
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for gate sample1 slave delay encoded values for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GATE_SMPL1_SLV_DLY_ENC_OBS_2
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for gate sample1 slave delay encoded values for slice 2.

bit_ranges.description: Observation register for gate training first hard 0 DQS slave delay for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_ERROR_OBS_2
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for write leveling error status for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_STATUS_OBS_2
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for gate training status for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_HARD1_DELAY_OBS_2
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for gate training last hard 1 DQS slave delay for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_RDDQS_DQ_LE_DLY_OBS_2
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for read leveling data window leading edge slave delay setting for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_RDDQS_DQ_NUM_WINDOWS_OBS_2
bit_ranges.description: Observation register for read leveling number of windows found for slice 2.

bit_ranges.description: Observation register for read leveling status for slice 2.

bit_ranges.description: Observation register for write data leveling status for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RX_CAL_DQ0_2

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RX_CAL_DQ7_2
bit_ranges.description: RX Calibration codes for DQ7 for slice 2. Bits (5:0) contain rx_cal_code_down. Bits (11:6) contain rx_cal_code_up. Bits (17:12) contain rx_cal_code2_down. Bits (23:18) contain rx_cal_code2_up.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_DELAY_EARLY_THRESHOLD_2
bit_ranges.description: Write level delay threshold above which will be considered in previous cycle for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRITE_PATH_LAT_ADD_2
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to delay the incoming dfi_wrdata_en/dfi_wrdata signals for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDDQS_LATENCY_ADJUST_2
bit_ranges.description: Number of cycles to delay the incoming dfi_rddata_en for read DQS gate generation for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_EARLY_FORCE_ZERO_2
bit_ranges.description: Force the final write level delay value (that meets the early threshold) to 0 for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WRLVL_DELAY_PERIOD_THRESHOLD_2
bit_ranges.description: Write level delay threshold below which will add a cycle of write path latency for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_LAT_ADJ_START_2
bit_ranges.description: Initial read DQS gate cycle delay from dfi_rddata_en during gate training for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_GTLVL_RDDQS_SLV_DLY_START_2
bit_ranges.description: Initial read DQS gate slave delay setting during gate training for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_RDLVL_RDDQS_DQ_SLV_DLY_START_2
bit_ranges.description: Read leveling starting value for the DQS/DQ slave delay settings for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: PHY_WDQLVL_DQDM_SLV_DLY_START_2
bit_ranges.description: Initial DQ/DM slave delay setting during write data leveling for slice 2.

bit_ranges.name: RESERVED
